singleton_with_instance: You can have only one installation of __module_title__. If you want to reinstall or uninstall this app go to Active Apps.
jamesbox_update_manuel_restart: Restart is not supported. Please replug the power supply for 5 seconds or press the hardware reset button (see user manual) to force a POPP Hub restart.
error_license_request: Unable to load a license key from the remote server.
ie_edge_not_supported: Sorry, but SmartHome does not support Internet explorer and Edge. Please use Firefox, Chrome, Safari or Opera.
upload_allowed_formats: The uploaded file must be in one of the following formats: __extensions__
upload_allowed_size: The uploaded file must be smaller than __size__.
upload_file_info: The uploaded file must be smaller than __size__ and in one of the following formats: __extensions__.
image_recommended_dimension: The recommended dimension of the images is __dimension__ px.
connection_refused_info: Please check your ethernet connection and the power supply of your gateway. Try to reload the page after some minutes to get back to the Smart Home UI.
jamesbox_connection_refused: Please wait, the update is in progress ...
jamesbox_connection_refused_info: __reload_begintag__ Try to reload the page after some minutes to get back to the Smart Home UI.__reload_endtag__ __attention_begintag__ ATTENTION: Please don't remove the power supply during the update. __attention_endtag__
jamesbox_update_2: The firmware will be upgraded automatically during the restart.
jamesbox_update_3: The update will take about 5 - 10 minutes. In this time the Smart Home UI won't be reachable.
jamesbox_update_attention: ATTENTION: Please don't remove the power supply of the POPP Hub as long the update is in progress. This could lead to irreparable damage on the hard- and software.
jamesbox_update_follow_steps: Please obey the following steps to upgrade the firmware of your POPP Hub:
jamesbox_current_firmware: Your current firmware is __currentfw__. There is a new firmware available. Would you like to update your gateway firmware to version __newfw__?
jamesbox_update_exists: You've already confirmed the update. Please replug the power supply for 5 seconds or press the hardware reset button (see user manual) to force a POPP Hub restart.
no_events: Sorry, there are no events to show.
hide_element_info: Only hide this element in any View
deactivate_element_info: This element can not be used for any scene, app, module and is fully deactivated
no_device_installed: There is no device installed yet
can_add_app: You can add an app in the section
can_include_device: You can include a device in the section
app_average_scored: The average number of points scored
info_missing_licence: Please apply your License or buy one if you dont have any license for this device.
how_to_resolve_zwave_errors:
Please check
1.) if the controller is plugged in correctly,
2.) that in the app 'Z-Wave Network Access' the right port is entered
(UZB: '/dev/ttyACM0', Box: '/dev/ttyAMA0', UZB-Windows: '\\\\.\\COM3', Z-Stick: '/dev/ttyUSB0', embedded boxes: '/dev/ttyS0' or '/dev/ttyS1')
3.) the app is aktiv. If not you could activate it under Menu > Apps > Active or add a new one under Menu > Apps > Local.
The Setting 'Expert View' needs to be active under Menu > My Settings.
error_remote_access_init: Can't intialize remote access data. Please deactivate/activate it in Apps-Active tab.
configuration_cancel: The auto-configuration of the device (Z-Wave Interview) did not complete. You may not have  all device functions available. You should reset the device and redo the inclusion process.
error_exclusion_time: EXCLUSION takes a long time to start up.
error_inclusion_time: INCLUSION takes a long time to start up.
error_zwave_network: An unexpected error occurred while initialising the Z-Wave controller data.
error_zwave_device: An unexpected error occurred while loading the Z-Wave device.
error_interview_secure_failed: Secure Inclusion  failed. Exclude and try to include again.
error_interview_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred while configuring the device.
error_interview_battery: You must to wake up the device to complete the inclusion.
factory_default_info: This will remove all already installed or updated apps, devices, settings etc.
factory_default_war: Are you sure you want to reset all to default factory settings?
already_rated: You have already rated this APP
nonunique_user: The given user login already exists. Please use a different login name.
nonunique_email: The given email already exists. Please use a different email.
password_email_info: Please provide the email address in case you loose your password.
management_trans_info: This translation was provided by Z_Wave.Me http://www.zwave.me For contact please use info@zwave.me
bugreport_info: This form is dedicated to report bugs in the UI please do not provide any response. If you need support please consult the support forums or email addresses provided.
password_forgot_info: To reset your password, enter the email address.
password_forgot_success: Please check your email to confirm your password reset.
email_notfound: Given email does not exist in our database
token_notfound: Given key does not exist in our database
backup_wait: Creating a backup file. Please wait...
remove_device_from_network: You want to remove and reset device from your Z-Wave network?
start_removal: Please start the removal and resetting process by hitting the button below.
confirm_exclusion: Now confirm the exclusion in the device to be removed. You may need to consult the device manual for more information  about how to confirm the exclusion or removal of the device. This process will also reset the devcie back to factory default.
broken_device: The device is broken or lost
broken_device_war: Please use this process only in case your device is really damaged, broken or not available anymore. It will remove the device but not reset it so that I can not be used in a different network again.
broken_device_info: The wireless connection to the device is tested. This process may take some minutes. If the device is alive it will _NOT_ be excluded from the network. In this case use the exclusion and reset process above.
password_info: You are still using the default password. However, this is very unsecure and we recommend to change it.
app_installation_successful_but_restart_: The app was successfully installed. Please restart your Raspberry.
app_update_confirm: After update an instance may not works. In this case please remove this device from the "Active" list an install again. Are you sure to update an App?
app_update_successful_but_restart_necess: The app was successfully updated. Please restart your Raspberry
app_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete App?
app_delete_successful_but_restart_necess: The app was successfully deleted. Please restart your Raspberry
app_reset_confirm: All App instnces will be deleted
device_no_event: This device does not have an event
welcome_no_devices: There are no devices on dashboard
welcome_step2: Select an element from the list and click on the Gear icon
welcome_step3: In the settings window check "Add to dashboard"
manual_config_prepare: Preparing for manual configuration. Please wait...
app_store_access_info: The App Store contains apps from different sources and on different maturity levels. On default you will only see mature and approved apps for download. Adding different Tokens may open you the access to apps not shared to the public yet and apps that are in alpha or beta state. The developers will usually give you can access token you can add to the list of tokens below
manual_config_prepare: Preparing for manual configuration. Please wait...
backup_info: A backup file will be created that includes all custom configurations, downloaded apps and Z-Wave controller data. You should store this on your computer. A completely reseted controller couldn't be restored with this backup. Please use the backup / restore functionality from the ExpertUI under Network > Controller instead.
device_exists: Zariadenie už existuje. Odinštaluj zariadenie a potom ho znova nainštaluj.
room_image_upload_info: Nahrávaný obrázok musí byť menší ako 600 kB a v jednom z nasledujúcich formátov: JPEG, GIF. Odporúčané rozmery nahrávaných obrázkov sú 200 x 200 pixelov.
keep_password_empty: Nechajte prázdne ak nechcete zmeniť Heslo.
firmware_update_info: Otvorí sa nové okno. Ak chcete aktualizovať firmvér, kliknite na možnosť Pokročilé -> Firmvér a pokračujte podľa inštrukcií.
factory_default_error: Nemožno vrátiť systém k Predvoleným nastaveniam.
are_you_sure_restore: Ste si istý, že chcete prepísať súčasnú konfiguráciu? Vytvorili ste si zálohu? Notice: A completely reseted controller cannot be restored by this .zab-backup-file. Please use the backup / restore functionality from the ExpertUI under Network > Controller instead. Activate 'Also restore network topology information (please read the user manual first!)' during restore. (not recommended)
restore_backup_chip: Taktiež obnoví informáciu o sieťovej topológii (prosím prečítajte si najprv manuál!)
restore_done_reload_ui: Obnova kompletná! Prosím znova načítajte stránku
licence_upgrade_info: Firmvér Vášho Z-Wave vysielača obsahuje funkciu, ktorá vám umožní povoliť/zakázať niektoré funkcie hardvéru. Napr. maximálny počet povolených ovládaných zariadení alebo iné funkcie.
licence_upgrade_key: Ak ste obdržali licenčný klúč pre vylepšenie funkcií, môžte tento klúč použit a rozšíriť funkcie Z-Way.
enocean_not_active: EnOcean aplikáciu nie je aktivovaná. Prosím Nainštalujte/Aktivujte túto Aplikáciu.
enocean_nosupport: Žiadny EnOcean Hardvér nie je dostupný. Prosím skontrolujte vašu hardvérovú konfiguráciu.
inclusion_manualy: Teach-In a ručne vyberte EnOcean profil.
inclusion_proces_done: Nové zariadenie bolo nainštalované a je pripravené na použitie.
inclusion_error: Niečo sa nepodarilo počas pridávania(inclusion). Prosím skúste zopakovať proces.
events_hidden: Niektoré typy udalostí sú skryté. Môžte to zmeniť v "Mojich Nastaveniach"
remote_access_not_active: Správa vzdialeného prístupu nie je aktivovaná. Prosím aktivujte ju v Apps-Active tab.
remote_access_not_installed: Správa vzdialeného prístupu nie je inštalovaná. Prosím pridajte novú 'Vzdialený prístup' ( Apps > local > Remote Access > +New App ) app v lokálnych Aplikáciach.
inclusion_interview_not_complete: Zariadenie nájdené ale konfigurácia nie je kompletná.
error_403: 403 Zakázané. Nemáte povolenie na zobrazenie tejto stránky!
remote_access_warning: Prosím, majte na pamäti, že budete potrebovať mať iný spôsob, ako nájsť svoj Z-Box vo vašej sieti, pretože služba find.zwave.me bude ukončená.
success_send_report: Report bol úspešne uložený. Kópia bola odoslaná na vašu emailovú adresu
no_devices_dashboard: Nie sú žiadne zariadenia na ploche
welcome_1: Vítajte vo Vašom Smart Dome www.smarterhome.sk
welcome_2: Môžte sa prihlásiť s prihlasovacím menom: "admin" a heslom: "admin"
welcome_3: Prosím nezabudnite zmeniť vaše heslo v menu "Mojich nastaveniach".
error_module_delete_active: Nedá sa odstrániť aplikácia. Inštancia aplikácie je aktívna.
conf_apply_battery: Batéria zariadenia musí byť prebudená na aktivovanie zmien nastavení
value_not_stored_indevice: ale nebola vložená do zariadenia, zatiaľ
error_load_user: Užívaťel nenájdený. Prosím skonrolujte si svoje prihlasovacie meno a heslo
lb_include_preparation: Zariadenie musí byť v stave továrenských predvolených nastavení. Ak ste si neistý ohladom toho, iba spustite
lb_inclusion_info: Proces pridania (inclusion) pripojil vaše nové zariadenie k Z-Wave sieti. Uistite sa, že zariadenie je v továrenskom základnom stave. Inak proces pridania (inclusion) nebude fungovať. Ak ste si nie istý, prečitajte si v manuáli ako resetnúť zariadenie do továrenských nastavení alebo vykonať odobratie (exclusion) zariadenia.
lb_new_device_found: Nové Zariadenie nájdené. Prosím čakajte na dokončenie konfigurácie nového zariadenia
lb_new_device_configured: Nové zariadenie nastavené a pripravené na použitie. Nové zariadenie je nazvané
lb_delete_confirm: Ste si istý, že toto chcete odstrániť?
lb_include_device_mains_error: Niečo nevyšlo počas pridávania (inclusion). Prosím odoberte (exclude) zariadenie a opakujte proces.
lb_include_device_battery_error: Nemohlo sa dokončiť pridávanie (inclusion). Zariadenie sa pravdepodobne uspalo. Prosím zobuďte zariadenie na dokončenie konfigurácie.
lb_no_module: App neexistuje alebo nemá platné parametre
lb_add_dashboard_confirm: Toto znamená, že nemôžete použiť tento element znova. Ste si istý?
lb_solve_network_error: Pre vyriešenie sieťových problémov, sa obráťte prosím na
lb_permanently_hide_con: Toto znamená, že nemôžete použiť tento element znova. Ste si istý?
lb_waiting_for_device: Waiting for device to be added
lb_alerts_tt: Všetky tieto udalosti sa vytvorili bezpečnostnými senzormi a aplikáciami ako je dymový, dverový senzor, ...
